title: An Act relative to creating a voluntary do-not-sell list

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Sabadosa of Northampton, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 2695) of Lindsay N. Sabadosa relative to a voluntary do-not-sell list for firearms purchases.  Public Safety and Homeland Security.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Public Safety and Homeland Security

related_entities.name: committee on Public Safety and Homeland Security

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 10/31/2025 from 11:30 AM-05:00 PM in Gardner Auditorium
